summary: Paolo Mancuso is a gang boss whose rivals want dead. During a failed assassination attempt, he is bitten by an infected lab rat. In the short time he has left to live, he tracks down his enemies and kills them one by one.
cast: Antonio Sabato|Silvia Monti|Pier Paolo Capponi|Nicoletta Rizzi|Fred Williams|Mario Donen|Toni Ucci|Peter Carsten|Mel√π Valente|Giulio Baraghini|Bruno Di Luia|Nando Marineo|Mirella Rossi|Nicola D'Eramo|Elena Demerik|Salvatore Carrara|Nestore Cavaricci|Francesco D'Adda|Pasquale Fasciano|Lina Franchi|Silvio Klein|Alba Maiolini|Nando Sarlo|Luciano Zanussi
title: Milano: il clan dei Calabresi
